name: inputgen
description: Balanced input generator for structured JavaScript types.

scripts.build:wasm: mkdir -p wasm && cd wasm && cmake -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=$(dirname $(which emcc))/cmake/Modules/Platform/Emscripten.cmake -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && make -j$(nproc)

author: Addison Crump
